text: is a Japanese football player who plays for FC Tokyo. He played for Japan national team. ==Club career== === Sanfrecce Hiroshima === Takahagi started his professional career at Sanfrecce Hiroshima, a club he previously played with at youth levels. In 2006, Takahagi played a full season on loan with Ehime FC, before returning to Sanfrecce Hiroshima in 2007. === Western Sydney Wanderers === On 14 January 2015, Takahagi signed with Western Sydney Wanderers for their 2015 AFC Champions League campaign. He was released by the Wanderers on 6 June 2015. === FC Seoul === On 16 June 2015, Takahagi joined South Korean side FC Seoul in K League Classic. ==Club statistics== As of 26 March 2019 {|
